about_the_game:
Adventure Realm

Adventure Realm is an JRPG Dungeon crawler! Follow the lives of Lusio and his friends as they are mysteriously transported to another Realm! There, they must explore the new Realm and find the Gemstones to open the Door of Dimensions! Venture into dangerous dungeons, encounter Spawn Elite Monsters! Transform Treasure Spheres into items of your choice!

ATB Turn Based Combat!
Engage in a Turn Based ATB combat system with Stances, Rows, Ultras, Items, Spells and Abilities to use against your foes and claim victory!

Engaging Dungeon Combat!
As your Adventure Continues Dungeon encounters are not the same as normal encounters, some enemies may require to be defeated first before they cast a powerful spell or enemies will absorb other dead enemies and receive a power boost! Can you overcome these extra challenges?

Dungeon Reward System

Enjoy various Dungeons with the Dungeon reward system! 

As you traverse through dungeons, you can earn dungeon coins to buy Dungeon Gear! 
You can earn them by winning battles! Defeating Elite Monsters! Finding All treasure Spheres and Dungeon Books! 

BONUS
Found all Treasure Spheres? Defeated All enemies? Then you're entitled to bonus dungeon coins! Earn extra coins when you complete a set!

Quest

The Village of Everglade will be your main home away from home and you can interact with all the residents there. Some require your aid but will reward you handsomely.

What dangers and challenges await you in Adventure Realm?
